price: Ìwọ ènìyàn, kí ni ó tàn ọ́ jẹ nípa Olúwa rẹ, Alápọ̀n-ọ́nlé,
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu mā gharraka birabbika al-karīmi
